nodes.text: Zac was a boy who showed Force potential, but was not chosen to progress on to a Jedi Knight, but instead assigned to work on Dantooine. He had a connection with animals, and used this ability to help his friends defeat the Separatist droids when they attacked during the Clone Wars. Once they were safely in space, Zac suggested that their ultimate destination should be the Jedi Temple on Coruscant to graduate at last.
